website_summaries.verdict: Revlon fans love that this pressed finishing powder also comes in a translucent shade. It blends well and works for most who try it.
pros: Provides a lightweight, matte finish that feels nice on the face and doesn't have any sheen
Pressed formula is easy to apply with no mess
Does a good job absorbing oil and preventing shine
Oil-free formula that's ideal for oily or acne-prone skin types
cons: Looks chalky or too light on some complexions
Product doesn't last as long as other powders
The claim of 16-hour wear is questionable

customer_reviews.title: which is fine, but I'm 50
customer_reviews.text: No glow here; just matte, which is fine, but I'm 50, and just look chalky now. It does stay on, it does absorb oil (which is what I wanted), and it does not make me break out. Just wish they had spent the extra .01 cents to add some tiny bit of glitter so I don't look like a mannequin.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for very fair skin.
customer_reviews.text: I am very fair so this is a great color for my skin tone. Usually anything labeled “light” or “fair” is still too dark. Has a nice matte finish, no sparkles. There are only two faults - the applicator pad that comes with it is terrible and you get very very little product. I use a powder brush and was shocked that I hit pan so fast. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Awesome powder/Truly translucent!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great powder. I'm African American (dark-skinned) and bought this to reduce shine after applying my Revlon Photoready Makeup (I wear Mocha), which is pretty flawless on its own. I apply this over my makeup so you can't tell that I'm wearing makeup. ;) Creates even more of a flawless finish. I love it. I was hoping it wouldn't show up as a white layer or make my skin look dry instead but it truly is translucent! Great to "powder your nose" throughout the day, afterward, too. Can't imagine running out of it now.
customer_reviews.author: queenbananah

customer_reviews.title: The best makeup for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin with a natural tan, I've worn the Revlon Colorstay for many many years, the light/medium works with my skin tone, however I noticed that during the summer we spend a good time in the back yard with the grandkids and dog and I get tanned. After taking pictures I noticed my makeup color needed change. now I use the 2 in 1 makeup and concealer in nude and the Pressed Powder in Medium Deep.
customer_reviews.author: molsby

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice finishing powder
customer_reviews.text: This has a really nice airbrush finish to it. I do think this should be paired either with an oil control primer or oil control foundation. Otherwise you'll probably be reapplying a few times a day. I am right in the middle of oily and dry and this has been the case for me. Its excellent with a primer though!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic powder!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a powder that works perfectly for my skin! Applied only once and it stayed on the whole day! Works best when you apply it after the foundation. Covered all the stubborn spots and my skin looked gorgeous. Love that it doesn't wear off at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I tried it today and washed it off but my skin doesn't feel dried out like w Mary kay. Found my new brand. Will order again
customer_reviews.author: Sirving

customer_reviews.title: Been Using for Years
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years...I'm almost out...coronavirus is going strong...can't get to a store...so I ordered it here!
customer_reviews.author: Savivi

customer_reviews.title: Works great to take away oily look
customer_reviews.text: It's the a really good translucent powder. Used by itself it made me look like I was wearing make up. I have oily t-zone and this does a good job getting rid of the oily look. I bought two in 2018, and I just bought 4 more to make sure that I don't run out.
customer_reviews.author: Vancisa Francis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ohhh my beloved compact. This stuff STAYS PUT. I wear the powder over my foundation and it gives me a super even lasting stay. I even work out in my makeup, touch up with a little powder after, and my makeup still looks fresh. I doubt I'll switch to any orher pressed powder after my experiece with this.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Sonnier

customer_reviews.title: The best pressed powder I have found.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. It is my go-to powder of choice. Beautiful staying power, smooth application and doesn't turn orange after hours of wear. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: freedom girl

customer_reviews.title: Stays put!
customer_reviews.text: Color Stay is perfect for me. One time application in the morning and it stays put. It's my favorite brand for powder foundation and mascara. It blends well with concealer and doesn't look like liquid foundation can look when someone put it on a little too heavily. I can't see it when I'm done. I don't like to look like I have makeup on.
customer_reviews.author: MominSchool

customer_reviews.title: Very sheer coverage. Darker, more orange than expected
customer_reviews.text: Wrong color. Medium looks too dark on my South-East Asian skin. Also sheer coverage. The seller refunded me. I didn’t have to send it back so I am happy I got a free powder pac but my 2star reflects the actual quality of product.
customer_reviews.author: Mret W.

customer_reviews.title: Highlights your imperfections!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff clumps up very easily. I tried 3 different brushes and it was very....wrinkle and pore defining. I'm now applying it with a damp beauty blender to get rid of it which is the only way I won't look 1000 years old (I'm in my 20s). It also has a very white cast on me but it may not show up on lighter skin (I have a very light tan).
customer_reviews.author: A.M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cakey and doesn’t really last
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this with the colorstay foundation and starts to wear off in just a few hours! Looks cakey and dry on skin than other cosmetics and yes I moisturize!
customer_reviews.author: Ola

customer_reviews.title: Not to stand on its own, ok overall
customer_reviews.text: It's ok - I like to wear foundation and nothing on top and this shows drier patches on my face very prominently and doesn't tend to stick well. My old foundation got discontinued so I'll keep looking...
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Revlon for long time. One of the many reason that I like it is that the color selection is very easy to choose, no weird color name that you don't know what it is or what shade to pick. I'm medium deep and that's it. Thank you Revlon for making it so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela J.

customer_reviews.title: Best powder I've used
customer_reviews.text: Best powder I've used, works great with the Revlon color stay foundation. I will definitely be buying more when mine runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: reasonably priced, good color
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate longevity because I haven't had it long. The color was better than I expected. Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: A. Reviewer

customer_reviews.text: I'm browned skin and this stuff makes me look white. It's not translucent at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kriss

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the same brand liquid foundation. I haven't tried it with another foundation. I do sweat a lot in the California summer sun and this stays on ALL day.
customer_reviews.author: Mxd Chx

customer_reviews.title: Using Revlon ColorStay Pressed Powder for 5 yrs and going, Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I am using Revlon ColorStay Pressed Powder for about 5 yrs now and I love it. This suits my skin tone very well and keeps oil at bay for 4hrs . I reapply a bit after 4 hrs to maintain oil free look. I have sensitive skin and this suits me well without breaking me out or I have not had any adverse reaction to it.
customer_reviews.author: Suhashini

customer_reviews.title: Perfect face powder !
customer_reviews.text: Ladies , if you have the shinny face look, this is the product for you and it also helps keep makeup in place !
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: good coverage without looking chalky. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KC AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product 5 stars if it weren't for the fact it runs out fast. Other than that it gives great coverage, is light weight and blends in well with you skin.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McAfoos

customer_reviews.title: Love this Powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this Revlon ColorStay pressed powder. Doesn't clump, is not greasy and comes in translucent. Cant seem to find translucent in many other brands. Price was good on Amazon to. Very happy with this powder and purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Bad Person

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it I wear it every day it doesn’t feel like you have on makeup
customer_reviews.author: Demethra Miles

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. Could get cheaper at drug store but it is convenient to order oline. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have wasted my money twice trying to find the right Color for me.
customer_reviews.author: Corina Clautice

customer_reviews.title: This pressed powder is great for helping your foundation to stay all day
customer_reviews.text: This pressed powder is great for helping your foundation to stay all day. it helps get rid of the excess oil that can build up throughout the day. I've tried multiple drugstore powders, and this one is, by far, the best!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Whatley

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for quite some time. Don’t need any other product. Covers flaws, does not feel heavy on the face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The good on the face
customer_reviews.text: I love this powered press makeup.It doesn’t leave a shine like most makeup does.I love how affordable it was
customer_reviews.author: Denise Trammell

customer_reviews.title: Not deep at all
customer_reviews.text: Colour is way too light to be advertised as deep....a complete waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Annieja

customer_reviews.title: Best cheap powder
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cheap blot powder i have found, does not get cakey, can touch up all day
customer_reviews.author: Cat Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Do not care for the case the product is in
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice, but I do not care for the compact that contains the product. It is awkward to open and close. Prefer the traditional style of compact.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Yesss.
customer_reviews.text: Lovee it, really makes a face look complete and being really pale there's hardly any powder in a light enough shade it's nice not to be orange for a change
customer_reviews.author: Mr banna man

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Best powder in my opinion it makes my makeup waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Bella Reed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Used this lately on makeovers, perfect performance, especially if used with the liquid foundation
customer_reviews.author: micaela brust

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: It's a translucent powder. What can I say? It includes a mirror and an applicator and does exactly what it should. Great for me - a beginner at makeup!
customer_reviews.author: SarahTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: My favorite powder!
customer_reviews.text: Best powder I’ve ever used! I have super oily skin and it’s the only one that keeps me shine free for at least a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Trista Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Used daily and still it is very durable to use for future. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Bibash A.

customer_reviews.title: Parcel arrived empty! Now what?
customer_reviews.text: The product was NOT in the parcel when it arrived...empty envelope
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have really sensitive skin and this powder is great for me! It’s perfect for touch ups throughout the day when I get shiny skin and doesn’t alter the look of my makeup. I used to use Mac but this is much more reasonably priced and just as good if not better than their product!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Really good brand and product.
customer_reviews.text: Really good face powder Ivery been using this product for a few years now and it's really good. And this is an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: shain88

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This powder is as good or better than anything Lancôme or Ester Lauder sells for triple the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: I like this compact powder.
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it helped control oil a little better. Within an hour or 2 of not doing much, I would need to re-apply. But I still like it and have used it for a year or 2.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: coverage is great!
customer_reviews.text: Coverage is great, lasts a long time and is a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder. Feels light, even in hot, humid temperatures. The application pad does wear out quickly. Best price found from any retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: My go to powder
customer_reviews.text: The texture, feel and wear of this powder is my favorite. I have been using it for the last 7 years. I haven't found anything that looks more natural or provides better coverage.
customer_reviews.author: MushaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I have been really pleased with this product and will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gentry

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE KEEP THIS WONDERFUL COMPACT ALIVE
customer_reviews.text: My favorite compact makeup for years. I occasionally say a prayer that Revlon won't discontinue this in my lifetime. Don't you hate when that happens?
customer_reviews.author: lindawithasmile

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This powder is so light. It doesn’t come on too much either which is great
customer_reviews.author: McQuadeH

customer_reviews.title: Have used this powder for years. I don't wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used this powder for years. I don't wear makeup, but when I need to cover the shine, this one does it well
customer_reviews.author: Gina Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me
customer_reviews.text: Fragrance-free was the reason I bought it. But I am dissapointed, I am sensitive to fragrance, I can still sense the odor. And less user-friendly to find the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Among the best drugstore powders on the market and Amazon's prices is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: i expected something darker. this has me looking ashy. other than that its perfectly okay .
customer_reviews.author: Tilda

customer_reviews.title: Color too light
customer_reviews.text: Color is WAY to light and makes me look very pale. Sad I wasted my money and won’t be able to use this product as the weight and matte shine are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Angmakin

customer_reviews.title: Return customer, will keep buying
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying a few of these each year, for many many years now; (I'll keep buying, unless I find a cheaper replacement that works as well).
customer_reviews.author: R G

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Idiotic design.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Super stupid design. I don't like to flip a stupid plastic flap to see a mirror. I want the old compact design. This had a little partition for the applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Honest MacGyver

customer_reviews.title: so happy
customer_reviews.text: I have really sensitive skin. I am allergic to creme to powder foundation. Frustrating because all makeup I have to get has to be light weight. The only light weight foundation I can use always has some sort of moisturizer in it so it doesn't stay and gets an intense shine before that. This product makes it stay and reduces the shine. Best product I have tried in a long time... and I'm always looking for new makeup, so I have tried a ton. Nothing ever worked so great. Beyond satisfied!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AliciaTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Original Product
customer_reviews.text: Same product as in stores just at a better price!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Martin

customer_reviews.title: Revlon pressed powder
customer_reviews.text: The coverage is great - I use a brush not the pad provided.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hasse

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job well?
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the shine under control for hours yet feels light on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The price is reasonable and the quality is good. One is that the puffs on the face are missing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like the soft buttery texture. Makes my foundation last awhile. If you have dry skin like I do please use moisturizer or you dry patches will show

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Shade is lighter then I thought it looked on line. Nice product.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth finish
customer_reviews.text: The powder applies well and occasionally a touch up around the nose and lips.
customer_reviews.author: 2002dreamgirl

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the compact and the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Revlon Colorstay is quality makeup that is affordable.
customer_reviews.text: This does stay in place for the 16 hrs it says. I fell asleep without removing and was still on in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really like this, no color just a nice finish. can't find out here in the world, yeah amazon!
customer_reviews.author: teewik

customer_reviews.title: Cool !!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this product! For full coverage I definitely recommend adding a bit of water or something along the line !
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Love this pressed powder - it's the best one I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this pressed powder - it's the best one I've ever used. It absorbs oil and mattifies without being cakey. It totally camouflages my pores and stays on for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor C.

customer_reviews.title: Covers great. Doesn't clog pores
customer_reviews.text: Covers great. Doesn't clog pores. Works great on my sensitive skin!

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: Love love love . great price and looks great and stays on . keeps makeup looking fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Andrew DeBarmore

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this as my finish powder for about two years now. Tried other things but always go back to this one. Great product and great value.
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Color is great but does not last long enough.
customer_reviews.text: Probably because my skin tends to be oily, but I did expect a longer duration. It is matte when recently applied, but it takes just about 3 hrs for it to start to look oily on me, then I have to clean my face and reaply. The color is perfect for light skin tones, though.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana336

customer_reviews.title: What I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps the skin dry looking and does not add color. It is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: judy s

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: The product works for my oily skin and gives me a sophisticated look.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It definitely stops the shine. Just a bit too white.
customer_reviews.author: tklamb64

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product and have been using it for several years.
customer_reviews.author: BeachShamus

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for Anyone with medium or dark skin tones
customer_reviews.text: When I received this I noticed it had a pink tint to it and thought this would be a problem. Once I tried to apply it I noticed it is in fact a white powder. I have medium skin tone, usually in the beige area for foundation colors, so this was a bit of a problem. I think I will be able to use it lightly to touch up my make up if I start to get shine throughout the day but it is not a product I would put all over my face and certainly not heavily.
customer_reviews.author: Kaybee

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all fay
customer_reviews.text: Took one star off, as the color is a bit pinkish, but this is great powder
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Best powder I've used that stays on all day
customer_reviews.text: Best powder I've used that stays on all day, takes care of shine, and also downplays redness in my face. Cheaper on Amazon than at Target.

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: The price is good, but I ran out faster than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: The product is lighter than expected instead of being "Translucent" ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is lighter than expected instead of being "Translucent". However it is still working as a typical Colorstay of Revlon, I mean, it lasts a lot and has the adequate coverage.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it 😃. Color was just like I though/ match my skin color 😊

customer_reviews.title: Color to dark
customer_reviews.text: Product to dark for my skin need a lighter color

customer_reviews.text: Gives your face a smooth finish without a cakey appearance.

customer_reviews.title: Not Exactly as Shown
customer_reviews.text: As far as the powder goes, no problem, just what I ordered. But the case it came in is not as pictured. Pictured was the old style case with a full round mirror. Received was the new style with 1/2 of a mirror. I am not a fan of the new style.

customer_reviews.title: pears well with my concealer
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product to use with highlighter and concealer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the product for years. It's works perfectly teamed up with the Colorstay Foundation. Wears a long time with little to no rub off. I was however very disappointed on how I received this product. It clearly was thrown in the box. Press powder was received broken in pallet with powder all over.

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. I prefer the Photoready pouder of Revlon though, cause I think it covers imperfections better, but this works pretty well

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy and unflattering on my pale skin
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy and looks orangey on my super pale skin. I tried applying with a brush to prevent such heavy coverage but then my skin gets oily very quickly. If I apply with a "puff," coverage is heavy and looks orange on my skin.

customer_reviews.text: My pale daughter wears it daily. It gives a nice even skin tone without looking like makeup.

customer_reviews.text: I love this product and it is my go to powder. Finding it for a great price on Amazon is wonderful!

customer_reviews.title: great if you don't want a caked on look
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I originally got medium and it made my face look cakey. I was too afraid to get the medium deep because my complexion is already difficult to match with foundations. Translucent is perfect esp for my oily skin.

customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I use it everyday. It is lightweight but good coverage.

product_meta.title: Revlon ColorStay Pressed Powder, Longwearing Oil Free, Fragrance Free, Noncomedogenic Face Makeup, Translucent (880)
product_meta.description:
Color:880 TranslucentComplete your look with Revlon ColorStay Pressed Powder for a fresh, flawless finish. It minimizes shine and lasts up to 16 hours. Lightweight and comfortable, this makeup powder provides medium coverage with a soft matte look. So whether you wear it with makeup, concealer, or on bare skin, you always get a flawless finish. Revlon is a global leader in cosmetics, hair color, fragrances, skincare, and beauty care products. One of the strongest consumer brand franchises in the world, Revlon’s products are sold in over 100 countries across six continents. Revlon revitalized the industry over the years with iconic nail and lip colors and with breakthrough technology like ColorStay transfer-resistant lipstick and makeup.

BRAND STORY
By Revlon
feature_bullets: Provides all-day flawless finish with shine control
Wears for up to 16 hours over makeup
Glides on weightlessly and blends evenly for medium coverage
Oil-free, fragrance-free, and won’t clog pores
